TextView.android:text: Main Menu\n you can choose an option or a task from here Like you can start the monitoring, change Settings, help, View Data, define user bounds etc..

Define Boundary\n you can define a Starting point and from that point a boundary (in meters). you define the range in meters and you can click on the map to choose the starting point. When the user exits this defined region a message is sent to the provided contact number

Show Path\n You can view the previous monitored data on a map. The map shows places (markers) where the user has been and when along with his motion status uyo can also clear the previous data if you dont need it anymore
